title: Grand Portage National Monument: Support Your Park
body: Support Your Park       There are many ways to support your Monument. Through volunteering or supporting our partnerships at Grand Portage National Monument, you can become more involved in activities at your national park. Please click on one of the links above for more information.  Â     Volunteers reenact a partners business meeting of the famed North West Company in the Great Hall at Grand Portage during Rendezvous Days. NPS Photo / Mike Plummer-Steen
